text:
*Use Case with Serveless*
On a HubSpot Website CMS I need to create a specific form for a telecom operator that get fiber eligibility
After form submission I need to make a request  and get the response. The request has to be server side to hide data.

So my question is simple : *how can I trigger a node function after submitting a form ?*

On form submit you would execute a fetch with the form field values to your HubSpot serverless function. Your function handles all of the logic and returns a result back to your page. You can then use javascript in your page to return a “Congrats you are fiber elligible!” message

<https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Fetch_API/Using_Fetch>
can also use jquery ajax if it’s more familiar.

Axios is also helpful
<https://github.com/axios/axios>
